questions.question: Can there be more than 1 final path in a graph using minimax?

explanations.a: When multiple minimum/maximum nodes are present then we can have multiple paths as we can chose any of the those

questions.question: To solve minimax algorithm on a graph what kind of traversal do we use?

explanations.a: Since we have to build bottom up so we perform Depth First Traversal

questions.question: Where can we use minimax algorithm?

explanations.d: We can use minimax algorithm in all of these
